title: Spinach Artichoke Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta 7-10 mins. Drain. While cooking pasta, prepare the sauce. Drain artichoke hearts & roughly chop into smaller pieces. Squeeze excess moisture out of thawed spinach. Set spinach & artichokes aside. Mince garlic & add to large skillet with olive oil. Saute over medium heat for 1 minute, just until garlic softens. Add cream cheese, sour cream, & white wine. Stir & cook until cream cheese has melted & sauce is smooth. Whisk milk into sauce & heat through. Once hot, turn down heat to low & stir in parmesan cheese. Season. Stir spinach & artichokes into sauce. Then add cooked pasta & stir to combine.
